title: core
text:
source

read_chronicle

 read_chronicle (dataset)


z = read_chronicle("../data/metrics.parquet")
assert type(z) == pl.dataframe.frame.DataFrame

z = read_chronicle("../data/logs.parquet")
assert type(z) == pl.dataframe.frame.DataFrame

z

title: py-chronicle
text:
** Work in progress **
The purpose of this experimental package is to expose functionality to make it easy to read, filter and manipulate chronicle parquet files.

title: py-chronicle
text:
How to use
Some examples.

read_chronicle("./data/metrics.parquet")

2
